title: Help Center
description: Find answers to your questions about using DazNode

questions.question: What is DazNode?
questions.answer: DazNode is a Lightning Network node manager that allows you to easily monitor and manage your Bitcoin node. It provides an intuitive interface to manage your payment channels, monitor your performance, and optimize your earnings.

questions.question: How do I set up my Lightning node with DazNode?
questions.answer: To set up your Lightning node with DazNode, you first need to install a Lightning node (like LND, c-lightning, or Eclair) on your server. Then, log in to DazNode and follow the setup wizard that will guide you through the process of connecting to your node.
